title: Job Vacancies at JMG Limited
content:
JMG is a diversified solution provider with a broad portfolio in power generation, electrical infrastructures, industrial equipment, elevators & escalators and HVAC solutions. With 20 years of experience in Africa and strong partnerships with some of the world’s leading brands, JMG combines global technologies and regional expertise to fulfill the development needs of the African market.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Logistics Assistant 

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	JMG is currently recruiting a Logistics Assistant to join our Port Harcourt operations. We are looking for a reliable and detail-oriented professional with strong logistics and inventory management experience.


Requirements


	A Degree in Accounting, Business Administration, or a related field
	3–5 years of experience in logistics, storekeeping, inventory control, and record-keeping
	Male candidates preferred
	Responsibilities:
	Support daily logistics and inventory operations
	Maintain accurate records of goods and stock levels
	Ensure proper documentation of inventory movement
	Assist in storekeeping and dispatch coordination


Application Closing Date: 1st July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: career@jmglimited.com using the Job Position and Location as mail subject.

 

 

2.)  Account Officer

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements


	HND or B.Sc. in Accounting
	Minimum of 2 years of experience as an Account Officer or Cashier.


Application Closing Date: 1st July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Application to: career@jmglimited.com using the Job Position as the subject to the mail.

 

 

3.) Inventory Audit Officer

Job Location: Gbagada, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Brief Description


	Responsible for conducting thorough audits, reconciling stock levels, investigating discrepancies, and collaborating with teams.


Duties


	Auditing stock Sampling on daily basis.
	Auditing assets when required.
	Attending to any sudden Audit Nationwide.
	Filing and Posting Audit when required.
	Quarterly full stock count.
	All Showrooms Audit twice a month.
	Take up IMS responsibilities such as reporting unsafe act, condition or procedure in the workplace, participating in fire or emergency drill at work, participating in incident reporting and investigation when necessary and adherence to Company policies.


Minimum Requirements


	B.Sc / HND qualification in any related field.
	3 - 5 years of proven working experience as an Inventory Audit Officer.


Competencies:


	Familiarity with modern warehousing practices and methods.
	Good organizational and time management skills.
	Ability to lift heavy objects.
	Ability to work under pressure.
	Analytical Skills.
	Excellent physical condition and coordination.


Application Closing Date: 25th July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: F.esawe@jmglimited.com using the Job Position as the subject to the mail.

title: Procurement / F&B Supervisor Job at Stardom Lounge
content:
Stardom Lounge is created to provide luxury lifestyle, entertainment and variety of tasty cuisines. We also thrive in providing employees comfortable work environment and opportunity for career growth.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Procurement / F&B Supervisor

Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Source and procure food and beverages from approved suppliers.
	Negotiate prices and terms with suppliers.
	Manage inventory levels to ensure adequate stock and minimize waste.
	Implement cost control measures to minimize waste and optimize profitability.
	Conduct regular audits to ensure compliance with company policies and procedures.
	Supervise food and beverage staff to ensure efficient and effective service delivery.
	Monitor food quality and presentation to ensure compliance with company standards.
	Maintain high levels of customer satisfaction through prompt and courteous service.


Preferred Qualifications


	Certification in procurement, hospitality, or related field.
	Experience with inventory management software and excellent knowlegde in microsoft office use (Excel)
	Knowledge of food safety and hygiene regulations.


Salary
N250,000 - N400,000 / month. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Recruitdv8@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Customer Service Officer Job at TeamAce Limited
content:
TeamAce Limited - Our client, a Culinary company, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service Officer
Job Location: Ikoyi, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	As our customer service officer, you will act as the point of contact for customers and provide information by responding to customers' queries and requests.
	You are to ensure customer satisfaction and provide support to customers.
	You must also ensure customer orders are taken appropriately, confirmed, and communicated to the appropriate department using the company’s approved process.


Responsibilities


	Ensure timely responses to customer inquiries and complaints, ensuring customer satisfaction at every step.
	Update the production and logistics schedules to meet clients’ demands.
	Manage delivery schedules, coordinating with drivers and logistics partners to ensure on-time, efficient deliveries.
	Address any customer complaints or issues directly, ensuring problems are resolved swiftly and to the customer’s satisfaction.


Requirements


	BSc / HND in a business-related field.
	Minimum of 2 to 3 years of relevant experience in Customer Service management, preferably in retail or food manufacturing.


Salary
N200,000 Monthly (Gross).

title: IT Support Officer Job at TeamAce Limited
content:
TeamAce Limited - Our client, a leading Frozen Distribution firm, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: IT Support Officer
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	As the IT Officer, you will be responsible for daily IT functions, troubleshooting hardware/software issues, and assisting with inventory systems and warehouse-related technologies.


Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Provide technical support for hardware, software, and networking issues across the organization.
	Install, configure, and maintain computer systems and networks.
	Monitor and maintain company systems, including inventory and warehouse management software.
	Support the implementation and smooth operation of warehouse technology, including barcode scanners, printers, and inventory tracking tools.
	Assist in managing backups, data recovery, and security protocols.
	Collaborate with warehouse staff to troubleshoot and resolve system-related challenges in inventory processes.


Requirements


	Bachelor's degree or HND in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in an IT support role.
	Basic knowledge of warehousing operations and inventory management systems.


Salary
N250,000 - N300,000 Monthly.
